For you, the almight dia 3 guy, Let me exclusivly for you, break down the t3f changes:
t3f lost 20% crit, gained 25% AS and 10% cdr.
the cdr is nice, always good to have, but not essensial on irelia/could get it from other items if needed.

Now the interesting part:
 25%AS are ~0.15 AS which means if irelia did 4 AAs, she now does 5 in the same timeframe.
lets say she has 1.0 AS with old t3f, her w lasts 6 sec. old Irelia does 6 AAs, new Irelia does 7,5(but this gets down to 7 because we dont have 0.5 AAs) So we only gained 1 AA and 1 onhit.
BUT old t3f has 20% crit and with 6 AAs there is statisticly 1 crit 100%, a crit is basicly a 2nd AA. So we only "gained" 1 onhit. But the old t3f could crit 2 or even times in this timeframe.
Remember This is the IDEAL scenario for the truedmg onhit, she actives her w the milisecond the AA hits, and the enemy doesnt moveaway. Every other(real) scenario favors the old t3f MORE.

So: New t3f is a little better at long trades(6sec+), old was better at bursting, building more crit and if you were lucky even at long trades too.
And now to the late game where you want to burst the enemy adc maybe:
you flash e, target is stunned for 2 sec. With 2.0 AS you do 4 AAs in these 2 sec. But if they have mercs, the stun lasts only for 1.333 so we can only do 2 AAs (after E theres a time before you can AA again.) So new t3f dont help you with the 2.15 As, but the old could crit and thus help you to burst them down.

As you see old t3f is way better then you thought, and the new t3f is even a NERF in short trades/bursts.
